mapper.sql: ID, date_key, org_code, cust_code, xs_amt, xs_qty, last_date,cust_name
mapper.select:
select
from hty_fct_member_org_detail where date_key = #{dateKey} and org_code = #{orgCode}
order by xs_amt desc
order by xs_qty desc
order by if(ISNULL(last_date),1,0),last_date
LIMIT 10

select SUM(xs_qty) as xs_qty,cust_code,cust_name from hty_fct_member_org_detail where date_key >= #{startTime} and date_key <= #{endTime} and org_code = #{custCode} GROUP BY cust_code ORDER BY xs_qty DESC LIMIT 10

select max(last_date) as last_date,cust_code,cust_name from hty_fct_member_org_detail where date_key >= #{startTime} and date_key <= #{endTime} and org_code = #{custCode} GROUP BY cust_code ORDER BY last_date DESC LIMIT 10

select SUM(xs_amt) as xs_amt,cust_code,cust_name from hty_fct_member_org_detail where date_key >= #{startTime} and date_key <= #{endTime} and org_code = #{custCode} GROUP BY cust_code ORDER BY xs_amt DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sum(xs_amt) FROM hty_fct_member_org_detail where org_code=#{orgCode} and date_key=#{dateKey} and xs_amt >= 0;
SELECT sum(xs_amt) FROM hty_fct_member_org_detail where org_code=#{custCode} and date_key >= #{startTime} and date_key <= #{endTime} and xs_amt >= 0;
